amendment.description: To strike the provision relating to the calculation of the 60-day period for application of patent term extension.

vote.text: Amendment SA 600 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 126.

action.text: Amendment SA 600 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S5402-5407, S5425-5436; text: CR S5402) To strike the provision relating to the calculation of the 60-day period for application of patent term extension.
